'''Ronni Rapalono''' is a woman who has a long-term extra-marital affair with [[Joey Tribbiani Sr.]],  [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]'s father. She was portrayed by [[Lee Garlington]] in "[[The One With The Boobies]]". She works as a pet mortician.
